name: Laser Mouse Murder House
description:
Laser Mouse Murder House

*ESC TO PAUSE* *AIM WITH MOUSE* *FIRE WITH MOUSE* *1,2,3,4 TO MOVE POSITIONS*

  • After having stayed the night Mice will emerge from the elevator at the top with a "Squeak" review.
  • They will mill about your lobby before they exit the lobby from the bottom.
  • DESTROY the ones with poor reviews.
  • DO NOT destroy the ones with good reviews.
  • Poor reviewers that survive make your "Squeak" rating go down
  • Good reviewers that survive make your "Squeak" rating go up
  • If your "Squeak" rating hits ZERO you lose.

All models, textures, music, and sound effects are original and were created during the game jam.

Credit to Scrim Scromble

We used Unity, Visual Studio, GIMP, Blender, Bosca Ceoil, Audacity to create this game.

Follow me on Twitch. I stream Game Jams.
